translations: v．使活跃，使生气勃勃：使某人或某事变得更有活力、更有趣。
· The music was livening up the party.
音乐让派对变得更加热闹。

sentences.sentence: You look as if you need livening up!
sentences.translation: 你看起来好像需要提提精神！

sentences.sentence: We just live for livening our lives up.
sentences.translation: 我们活着仅仅是要让自己的生活精彩起来。

sentences.sentence: Some Suggestions for livening up the Festival seem less than helpful.
sentences.translation: 一些活跃节日气氛的建议看来帮助较小。
